DataElementConcept.preferredName: Clinical Course of Disease Criterion Assessment Method
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A term that refers to the nature and/or clinical outcome of a disease (e.g., acute or chronic disease, aggressive or indolent disease, recurrent disease, etc.)._That which constitutes a standard from which a judgment can be established, a reference point against which other things can be evaluated, or a basis for comparison._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of._A means, manner of procedure, or systematic course of actions that have to be performed in order to accomplish a particular goal.
